Ancestry.com DNA Results

I bought an Ancestry.com DNA kit a few months back, and finally completed it and sent it back to them about 8 weeks ago. Got my results back today. No real surprises there.

The breakdown by region was as follows:

Region Percentage Range
Europe West 59% 27-90%
Ireland 17% 0-34%
Europe East 10% 0-22%
Iberian Peninsula 7% 0-16%
Scandinavia 5% 0-15%

Percentage

This is the average percentage match for the region. Ancestry.com takes 40 known DNA measurements per region, and then pulls 40 random sample markers from my DNA to see how closely my DNA matches the regionâ€™s average DNA across those 40 measurements.

Range

This is the range of percentage matches across the above 40 measurements. For example, for Europe West, I had a range of 27-90%, that means that the lowest match of one of my DNA markers to a known DNA marker from the Europe West region was 27%. The highest match of my DNA to one of the 40 DNA markers in the region was 90%.
